title: A Fine Mess
description: While picking up the pieces after a family tragedy, 24-year-old singer/songwriter Harper Foley tries to fix her relationship with her estranged sister, get closure on her relationship with her ex-fianc√©, and sort through her confusing feelings for her best friend, all while trying to come to terms with who she is. A twist on the traditional coming of age story, A Fine Mess is a story about navigating through the chaos and finding yourself among the wreckage.
author: Breanna Hughes
